dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Did you hear Kazakhstan is releasing a special 1,000 tenge banknote for Victory Day anniversary?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Did you hear Kazakhstan is releasing a special ten hundred tenge banknote for Victory Day anniversary?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan is issuing a commemorative 1,000 tenge banknote starting May 9, 2025, to mark the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory, citing the bank's press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that—it's to mark the 80th anniversary, right? Coming out May 9th next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that-it's to mark the eightieth anniversary, right? Coming out May ninth next year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan is issuing a commemorative 1,000 tenge banknote starting May 9, 2025, to mark the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory, citing the bank's press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it's a limited run too—only 5 million of these notes are being printed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it's a limited run too-only five million of these notes are being printed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The limited edition banknote will have a circulation of 5 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's uh, actually pretty exclusive for a national currency. I wonder if collectors will go crazy for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's uh, actually pretty exclusive for a national currency. I wonder if collectors will go crazy for it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the design sounds interesting—brown and beige color scheme, which is kind of a classic look.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the design sounds interesting-brown and beige color scheme, which is kind of a classic look.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The banknote's color scheme is brown and beige.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do we know what's on the front and back? Like, any specific imagery?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do we know what's on the front and back? Like, any specific imagery?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The National Bank's press service shared photos, but the details weren't super specific in the text. Probably historical or symbolic, I'd guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The National Bank's press service shared photos, but the details weren't super specific in the text. Probably historical or symbolic, I'd guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Front side features: Reverse side features: Photo: nationalbank.kz Photo: nationalbank.kz

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. And it's still fully functional money, right? Not just for show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. And it's still fully functional money, right? Not just for show.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally—you can spend it, deposit it, exchange it… it's legal tender everywhere in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally-you can spend it, deposit it, exchange it... it's legal tender everywhere in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The commemorative 1,000 tenge banknote is legal tender throughout Kazakhstan at face value for all types of payments, and can also be deposited, transferred, exchanged, and used in all banks across the country, the National Bank stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's cool. It's like everyday use meets collectible. Have they done something like this before?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's cool. It's like everyday use meets collectible. Have they done something like this before?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, they issued commemorative coins earlier for the same anniversary, so this banknote is part of that series.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, they issued commemorative coins earlier for the same anniversary, so this banknote is part of that series.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the National Bank issued commemorative coins for the 80th anniversary of Victory Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, so they're really going all out for the 80th anniversary. I wonder if the design will honor veterans or something along those lines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, so they're really going all out for the eightieth anniversary. I wonder if the design will honor veterans or something along those lines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Most likely. It's a nice way to keep the memory alive, you know, make it tangible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Most likely. It's a nice way to keep the memory alive, you know, make it tangible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with only 5 million notes, it might even gain value over time, beyond just the face amount.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with only five million notes, it might even gain value over time, beyond just the face amount.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure—a little piece of history you can actually hold in your wallet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure-a little piece of history you can actually hold in your wallet.
